mapper.select: SELECT waitst_cd, waitst_nm, wait_no, rcp_no, wait_dt, wait_num, div_cd, div_nm, RCP_DATE, OFFICE_CD, P.PA_NO, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_REG, P.PA_SEX FROM PATIENT P LEFT OUTER JOIN V_B ON P.PA_NO = V_B.PA_NO WHERE WAITST_CD = 'WS001' AND DIV_CD = 'DV008'

WITH REP_PAT AS (SELECT B.RCP_NO, C.PA_NAME FROM RECEPTION B, PATIENT C WHERE B.PA_NO = c.pa_no) SELECT PT_BED_CD, A.RCP_NO, D.RCP_NO, D.PA_NAME FROM PHYSIOTHERAPY A, REP_PAT D WHERE A.RCP_NO = D.RCP_NO(+) ORDER BY PT_BED_CD
